00035 
00036 class ContainerParameters : public IContainerParameters
00037 {
00038   VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT(ContainerParameters);
00039 public:
00040   virtual IRational* getTimeBase();
00041   virtual void setTimeBase(IRational* base);
00042 
00043   virtual int32_t getAudioSampleRate();
00044   virtual void setAudioSampleRate(int32_t sampleRate);
00045   
00046   virtual int32_t getAudioChannels();
00047   virtual void setAudioChannels(int32_t channels);
00048 
00049   virtual int32_t getVideoWidth();
00050   virtual void setVideoWidth(int32_t width);
00051   
00052   virtual int32_t getVideoHeight();
00053   virtual void setVideoHeight(int32_t height);
00054 
00055   virtual IPixelFormat::Type getPixelFormat();
00056   virtual void setPixelFormat(IPixelFormat::Type type);
00057 
00058   virtual int32_t getTVChannel();
00059   virtual void setTVChannel(int32_t channel);
00060   
00061   virtual const char* getTVStandard();
00062   virtual void setTVStandard(const char* standard);
00063 
00064   virtual bool isMPEG2TSRaw();
00065   virtual void setMPEG2TSRaw(bool setting);
00066   
00067   virtual bool isMPEG2TSComputePCR();
00068   virtual void setMPEG2TSComputePCR(bool setting);
00069   
00070   virtual bool isInitialPause();
00071   virtual void setInitialPause(bool setting);
00072   
00073   // Not for calling from Java
00074   virtual AVFormatParameters* getAVParameters();
00075 protected:
00076   ContainerParameters();
00077   virtual ~ContainerParameters();
00078   
00079 private:

00081   char mStandard[256];
